settings.description: Personal data processing is carried out in accordance with the requirements of the Personal Data Protection Act and is used solely for the needs of our store, such as product shipping and email correspondence. Data is not disclosed to third parties. Customers can consent to receiving newsletters to their email addresses containing information about promotions and updates in our store. Every customer has the right to access, correct, supplement, and update their data. By placing an order, the customer consents to providing us with their personal data, their storage, and processing for the purpose of order fulfillment.

settings.text_content:
Privacy Policy

Personal data processing is carried out in accordance with the requirements of the Personal Data Protection Act and is used solely for the needs of our store, such as product shipping and email correspondence. Data is not disclosed to third parties. Customers can consent to receiving newsletters to their email addresses containing information about promotions and updates in our store. Every customer has the right to access, correct, supplement, and update their data. By placing an order, the customer consents to providing us with their personal data, their storage, and processing for the purpose of order fulfillment.

Data is not disclosed to third parties. Customers can consent to receiving newsletters to their email addresses containing information about promotions and updates in our store. Every customer has the right to access, correct, supplement, and update their data. By placing an order, the customer consents to providing us with their personal data, their storage, and processing for the purpose of order fulfillment.
